de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment

Class PreferenceHeaderFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment.PreferenceHeaderFragment

  • public class PreferenceHeaderFragment
extends Fragment
    A fragment, which shows multiple preference headers and provides navigation to each header's fragment.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

      PreferenceHeaderFragment()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFragmentListener(FragmentListener listener)
      Adds a new listener, which should be notified on events concerning the fragment.
      PreferenceHeaderAdapter getListAdapter()
      Returns the adapter, which provides the preference headers for visualization using the fragment's list view.
      ListView getListView()
      Returns the list view, which is used to show the preference headers.

      • addFragmentListener

        public final void addFragmentListener(FragmentListener listener)
        Adds a new listener, which should be notified on events concerning the fragment.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be added, as an instance of the type FragmentListener. The listener may not be null

      • removeFragmentListener

        public final void removeFragmentListener(FragmentListener listener)
        Removes a specific listener, which should not be notified on events concerning the fragment, anymore.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener, which should be removed, as an instance of the type FragmentListener. The listener may not be null

        public final ListView getListView()
        Returns the list view, which is used to show the preference headers.

      • getListAdapter

        public final PreferenceHeaderAdapter getListAdapter()
        Returns the adapter, which provides the preference headers for visualization using the fragment's list view.
        Returns:
        The adapter, which provides the preference headers for visualization using the fragment's list view, as an instance of the class PreferenceHeaderAdapter
